PropertyList.text: STARTUP --------- Startup is automatic (for now), but you need to do a couple things: 1) Set the fuel guage - the fuel gauge does not automatically set to the level in the tank, you need to set the initial level. 2) Slave the gyrocompass - hold down the FDS button until the HI compass settles. The compass will drift over time, press the FDS button every now and again to reslave. 2b) Set the magnetic declination instrument to your current latitude to help minimize gyro error. INFO --------- - Check the installation directory for a how-to guide on weapons employment. - Second reheat (ctrl-f) is only effective below 15,000 feet MSL, and use should be limited to 3 minutes. - Smokepod colors are available in the dropdown menu.
